wikipedia_page.main: Paul Hunter (born 30 August 1968) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as a forward for East Fife (1984–89, 1994–95), Hull City (1989–93), Cowdenbeath (1993–94) and Stenhousemuir (1995–99). He played for Scotland under-20s in the 1987 FIFA World Youth Championship.

response: Paul Hunter (1978–2006) was an English snooker player.
Paul Hunter may also refer to:
*Paul Hunter (soccer, born 1956), Canadian soccer player, who played predominantly in the United States
*Paul Hunter (microbiologist)  (fl. 1980s–), professor of medicine at the University of East Anglia
*Paul Hunter (River City), a character on River City
*Paul Hunter Classic, a minor-ranking snooker tournament
